title: Refrigeration
bodyText: Refrigeration contributes approximately 30% to the carbon footprint of most of our cola products;and, of course, inefficient cooling implies unnecessary costs to our customers. Finding good solutions in refrigeration is not simply a matter of lowering emissions, but also a matter of being conscientious customers.

bulletPointFrame.title: Strategic Frame
bulletPointFrame.subtitle: We seek to innovate across each of these areas:

textFrames.bodyText: We are currently focusing on reducing our carbon footprint through much more efficient HFC-free cooling equipment and innovative uses of energy management devices and renewable energies.
